verses.name: Ezra 2:48
verses.text: The children of Rezin, the children of Nekoda, the children of Gazzam,

verses.name: Ezra 2:49
verses.text: The children of Uzza, the children of Paseah, the children of Besai,

verses.name: Ezra 2:50
verses.text: The children of Asnah, the children of Mehunim, the children of Nephusim,

verses.name: Ezra 2:51
verses.text: The children of Bakbuk, the children of Hakupha, the children of Harhur,

verses.name: Ezra 2:52
verses.text: The children of Bazluth, the children of Mehida, the children of Harsha,

verses.name: Ezra 2:53
verses.text: The children of Barkos, the children of Sisera, the children of Thamah,

verses.name: Ezra 2:54
verses.text: The children of Neziah, the children of Hatipha.

verses.name: Ezra 2:55
verses.text: The children of Solomon’s servants: the children of Sotai, the children of Sophereth, the children of Peruda,
